title: Crime Alert 06.22.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.22.20
description:
Mom leaves 3 kids under the age of 1 in the care of 7-y-o special needs child to get her hair done. Thieves use a hollowed out watermelon as mask.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
